author: Christina Zhao
title: Former President Jimmy Carter 'Distressed' By Decision to Cut Funding to World Health Organization
description: "WHO is the only international organization capable of leading the effort to control this virus," Carter said.
content:
Former U.S. President Jimmy Carter on Wednesday said he is "distressed" by the Trump administration's decision to suspend funding to the World Health Organization.
"I am distressed by the decision to withhold critically needed U.S. funding for the World Heal… [+894 chars]
